Hi,

She had many name includeing Eyo(Oeyo), Tatsuko, Gou(Ogou).
Anyway, she was 3rd daughter of Asai Nagamasa and Oichi (younger
sister of Oda Nobunaga).
She was mother of Kazuko, too.

> Can someone tell me who the father of Tokugawa Hidetada's wife (and 
> mother of Tadanaga and Iemitsu), Asai Aeyo, is?
------------------------------
 M.Nakazaki
